snippet: SHAPIRO--Blanche. The Board of Directors and Staff of the American Friends and of the Israel Museum, Jerusalem deeply mourn the death of our longtime friend, Museum Founder and AFIM Board member Blanche Shapiro. Blanche and her late husband, Romie, generously supported nearly every Museum department and enriched its collections with seminal gifts of art. We will miss her deeply. Stephen Lash and Judy Steinhardt, Board co- chairs, AFIM Stacey Bronfman, President, AFIM James Snyder, Anne and Jerome Fisher Dir., IMJ Leah Siegel, Exec Dir., AFIM 1/3
lead_paragraph: SHAPIRO--Blanche. The Board of Directors and Staff of the American Friends and of the Israel Museum, Jerusalem deeply mourn the death of our longtime friend, Museum Founder and AFIM Board member Blanche Shapiro. Blanche and her late husband, Romie, generously supported nearly every Museum department and enriched its collections with seminal gifts of art. We will miss her deeply. Stephen Lash and Judy Steinhardt, Board co- chairs, AFIM Stacey Bronfman, President, AFIM James Snyder, Anne and Jerome Fisher Dir., IMJ Leah Siegel, Exec Dir., AFIM 1/3
